review: I had my fixed orthodontic treatment done here to align my crooked teeth and now I am all smiles!!  My fear of visiting the dentist was completely gone when I interacted with Dr. Priyanka. She has been really helpful all throughout the course of my treatment and made it a lot easier for me. Definitely recommend this place for your complete dental care.

Dr Priyanka did the cleaning of my teeth and dental fillings so well! A very gentle and caring doctor. She explained oral hygiene wonderfully and guided me how to take care of oral health.  The clinic is also neat and hygiene is very well maintained. 
I would highly recommend her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review: Dr.Sumit  and Dr. Priyanka , the orthodontist husband and wife team, provided an exceptional experience. Their expertise, care, and attention to detail were evident from the start. They explained my treatment plan thoroughly and made sure I was comfortable throughout. With their combined skills, I received top-notch care and achieved great results. I highly recommend them for anyone seeking outstanding orthodontic treatment.

review: Got my braces treatment done from Dr Priyanka. I am happy with treatment and my smile  . She is very good and answers all questions

Got my implant done at Braces and Dental Works. I was very satisfied with way procedure was explained and post procedural instructions and care was taken. 
The charges were also very reasonable.
It was amazing and no pain at all during my extraction. In fact dr priyanka treated well and handled my queries carefully
Dr. Priyanka has set up a state of the art clinic in Prabhadevi which is very easily accessible. I liked her space and how she attended to me. She ** **** ************ *** gives sound advice.
